javaplow

Class PayloadMapC

  • Object
    • PayloadMapC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PayloadMap

    public class PayloadMapC
extends Object
implements PayloadMap
    PayloadMapC implements the PayloadMap interface The PayloadMap is used to store all the parameters and configurations that are used to send data via the HTTP GET request.
    Version:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Kevin Gleason

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PayloadMapC()
      Create an empty PayloadMap with a timestamp.
      PayloadMapC(LinkedHashMap<String,String> parameters, LinkedHashMap<String,Boolean> configurations)
      Can be constructed with the two payload lists.

      • track_ecommerce_transaction_item_config

        public PayloadMap track_ecommerce_transaction_item_config(String order_id,
                                                 String sku,
                                                 String price,
                                                 String quantity,
                                                 String name,
                                                 String category,
                                                 String currency,
                                                 org.json.JSONObject context,
                                                 String transaction_id)
                                                   throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Configuration to track an ecommerce transaction item. Not usually called alone, but called for each individual item of the ecommerce transaction function.
        Specified by:
        track_ecommerce_transaction_item_config in interface PayloadMap
        Parameters:
        order_id - ID of the item.
        sku - SKU value of the item.
        price - Prive of the item.
        quantity - Quantity of the item.
        name - Name of the item.
        category - Category of the item.
        currency - Currency used for the purchase.
        context - Additional JSON context for the tracking call (optional)
        transaction_id - Transaction ID, if left blank new value will be generated.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • track_ecommerce_transaction_config

        public PayloadMap track_ecommerce_transaction_config(String order_id,
                                            String total_value,
                                            String affiliation,
                                            String tax_value,
                                            String shipping,
                                            String city,
                                            String state,
                                            String country,
                                            String currency,
                                            org.json.JSONObject context)
                                              throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Track an Ecommerce Transaction Option to provide a Map of only strings of items in the transaction which can be used to track each individual ecommerce transaction item
        Specified by:
        track_ecommerce_transaction_config in interface PayloadMap
        Parameters:
        order_id - The transaction ID, will be generated if left null
        total_value - The total value of the transaction.
        affiliation - Affiliations to the transaction (optional)
        tax_value - Tax value of the transaction (optional)
        shipping - Shipping costs of the transaction (optional)
        city - The customers city.
        state - The customers state.
        country - The customers country.
        currency - The currency used for the purchase
        context - Additional JSON context for the tracking call (optional)
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
